Title: The Lord of No Mercy
Writer: Noah Hawley, Noah Hawley (created for television by)
Actors: Ewan McGregor, Carrie Coon, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Goran Bogdan
Plot: Gloria and Winnie get closer to the truth; Emmit tries to make things right; Nikki and Ray prepare for payback; Varga cleans up a mess.
